body_html:
They are different in that rnn_out is run every time even if they values are not used.

The "correct way" is that tf.nn.dynamic_run is inside the function. This is so that the gradient is called on the dynamic_run otherwise the gradient is being ignored.
body_text:
They are different in that rnn_out is run every time even if they values are not used.
The "correct way" is that tf.nn.dynamic_run is inside the function.   This is so that the gradient is called on the dynamic_run otherwise the gradient is being ignored.
body:
They are different in that rnn_out is run every time even if they values are not used.

The "correct way" is that tf.nn.dynamic_run is inside the function.   This is so that the gradient is called on the dynamic_run otherwise the gradient is being ignored.
